channel.title: Need alittle help with this tut
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,105421.msg1058895.html#msg1058895
Yea um.....im cant seem to be able to type in commands after i complete that tut....everytime i do, everyone on the server gets disconnected and its really annoying...someone please tell me how to fix it!

item.title: Need alittle help with this tut
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

il rewrite code for you brb…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 07:51:43 PM[/size][hr]try this : if(command.startsWith("pmod") && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 1; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Mod Don't Abuse Your Powers"); } if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Admin Don't Abuse Your Powers"); } if(command.startsWith("owner") && playerRights >= 2) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 3; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Co-Owner Don't Abuse Your Powers"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need alittle help with this tut
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

I get three errors…how do i fix?

cleint.java:10691: illegal start of the expression
if(command.startWith(“pmod”) && playerRights >=2)); {

cleint.java:10691: illegal start of the expression
if(command.startWith(“admin”) && playerRights >=2)); {

cleint.java:10691: illegal start of the expression
if(command.startWith(“owner”) && playerRights >=2)); {

and a ^ is under the last )) on each one…how do i fix?

Read full topic
item.source: Need alittle help with this tut

item.title: Need alittle help with this tut
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

I loot I, said those commands scriptscape posted are wrong, replace those commands with these::

if(command.startsWith("pmod") && playerRights >= 2)); { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 1; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Mod Don't Abuse Your Powers"); } if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 2)); { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Admin Don't Abuse Your Powers"); } if(command.startsWith("owner") && playerRights >= 2)); { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 3; c.sendMessage("You Are Now Co-Owner Don't Abuse Your Powers"); }

Read full topic
